hey lascruces, good idea to upload this again, however could i ask you to please seed for me? ill be sure to take over seeding when i finish as well. thanks
This is such an amazing, yet under-rated film!  Thank Lascruces for taking the time to rip this and share it with us!

I have so fond memories of this movie. I hope it has aged well.

Seeing as you have the DVD is your posession, might I request that you upload the DVD onto piratebay as well? I'm sure that would please many of us 80s afficionados.

In the meanwhile, thank you for this upload.

Thanks very much! (as in thanks alot alot alot)
Came across this as I saw the trailer of his recent "The Informers" and it said "From the author of Ameican Psycho and Less than Zero". Of course, having read and seen American Psycho, I had to see what this one was all about, so thanks to contributing to my morning pleasure of "I've got something great to watch!" :)
Good quality rip but this is honestly the worst movie I have ever seen. Read the book, it's sooooo much better
